info.name: Omena Agency CRM API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Omena Agency CRM with Express backend and Firebase. Includes Authentication, Customers, Services, Transactions, Expenses, Team Members, and Receipts.

request.description: Check if backend server is running

response.name: Success Response

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Backend authentication endpoints using Firebase Admin SDK

request.description:
Create new user account. Returns custom token for client-side authentication.

**Required Fields:**
- email: Valid email address
- password: Minimum 6 characters
- firstName: User's first name
- lastName: User's last name

**Optional Fields:**
- phoneNumber: Phone number with country code
- company: Company name

response.name: Success Response
Error - Email Already Exists
Error - Validation Failed

request.description:
Login with email and password.

**Required Fields:**
- email: User's email address
- password: User's password

response.name: Success Response
Error - Invalid Token

request.description: Refresh authentication token. Send current ID token, get new custom token.

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Get current user profile from Firestore.

**Authentication:** Required (Bearer token)

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "uid": "xYz123AbC456DeF789",
    "email": "john.doe@omena.com",
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Doe",
    "displayName": "John Doe",
    "phoneNumber": "+1234567890",
    "company": "Omena Agency",
    "photoURL": null,
    "emailVerified": false,
    "role": "employee",
    "status": "active",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z",
    "lastLogin": "2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"
  }
}

response.name: Error - Unauthorized

request.description:
Update user profile information.

**Authentication:** Required

**Updatable Fields:**
- firstName
- lastName
- phoneNumber
- company
- photoURL

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Profile updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "uid": "xYz123AbC456DeF789",
    "email": "john.doe@omena.com",
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Doe Updated",
    "displayName": "John Doe Updated",
    "phoneNumber": "+1987654321",
    "company": "Omena Digital Agency",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T11:30:00.000Z"
  }
}

request.description: Generate and send password reset link to user's email.

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Generate and send email verification link.

**Authentication:** Required

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Revoke all refresh tokens for user.

**Authentication:** Required

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Permanently delete user account.

**Authentication:** Required
**Warning:** This action cannot be undone!

response.name: Success Response

item.name: Customers
item.description: Customer management endpoints - CRUD operations for customers

request.description:
Retrieve all customers.

**Authentication:** Required

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Create a new customer.

**Authentication:** Required

**Required Fields:**
- firstName
- lastName
- email

**Optional Fields:**
- phoneNumber
- company
- address
- status (default: 'active')
- notes

**Authentication:** Required

Create a new service.

**Authentication:** Required

**Required Fields:**
- name
- description
- category
- price

**Optional Fields:**
- duration
- status (default: 'active')
- features (array)

exec: console.log('✅ Transaction created with ID:', response.data.id);

request.description:
Create a new transaction.

**Authentication:** Required

**Required Fields:**
- customerId: ID of the customer
- amount: Transaction amount
- type: 'income' or 'expense'
- date: Transaction date

**Optional Fields:**
- status (default: 'pending')
- description
- paymentMethod

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Transaction created successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": "txn_003",
    "customerId": "cust_003",
    "amount": 2500,
    "type": "income",
    "status": "pending",
    "date": "2024-01-17T09:00:00.000Z",
    "description": "Brand identity design project - 50% deposit",
    "paymentMethod": "credit_card",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-17T09:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-17T09:00:00.000Z"
  }
}

request.description:
Update transaction information.

**Authentication:** Required

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Transaction updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": "txn_003",
    "customerId": "cust_003",
    "amount": 2500,
    "type": "income",
    "status": "completed",
    "date": "2024-01-17T09:00:00.000Z",
    "description": "Brand identity design project - 50% deposit - PAID",
    "paymentMethod": "credit_card",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-17T11:00:00.000Z"
  }
}

request.description:
Delete a transaction.

**Authentication:** Required
**Note:** This is a soft delete - transaction status is set to 'deleted'

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Create a new expense.

**Authentication:** Required

**Required Fields:**
- category: Expense category
- amount: Expense amount
- date: Expense date
- vendor: Vendor name

**Optional Fields:**
- description
- receiptURL: URL to receipt file
- status (default: 'pending')

request.description:
Create a new receipt.

**Authentication:** Required

**Required Fields:**
- customerId: ID of the customer
- transactionId: ID of the transaction
- amount: Receipt amount
- date: Receipt date
- receiptNumber: Unique receipt number

**Optional Fields:**
- fileURL: URL to generated receipt PDF
- status (default: 'draft')
- notes

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Receipt created successfully",

request.description:
Create a new team member.

**Authentication:** Required

**Required Fields:**
- firstName
- lastName
- email
- role
- department

**Optional Fields:**
- phoneNumber
- photoURL
- status (default: 'active')
- hireDate
- salary

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Team member created successfully",

    "lastName": "Thompson",
